conclusion: Analyze the paths of the liquids from points A, B, and C to determine which container they flow into.
Liquid from A flows downward through the cyan-colored baffle.
Liquid from A continues straight down and flows into container D.
Liquid from B flows downward through the green-colored baffle.
Liquid from B continues straight down and flows into container E.
Liquid from C flows downward through the pink-colored baffle.
Liquid from C continues straight down and flows into container F.
Final answer: A flows into D, B flows into E, C flows into F.
